alert.note: Alert for Kingsbury; Lake; McCook; Miner (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 04 at 4:32AM MDT until July 04 at 4:45AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN KINGSBURY...WESTERN LAKE...EASTERN MINER AND NORTHEASTERN MCCOOK COUNTIES... At 531 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Howard to near Winfred to near Canova, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Winfred around 535 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Oldham, Lake Herman State Park, Ramona, Orland and Madison. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Sioux Falls.
